column1: Snap a rubber band on your wrist
Rub an ice cube on your wrist
Chew gum with a strong flavor
Scream as loud as you want
Take a hot shower (make sure there aren't razors in the shower!)
Take a bubble bath (make sure there aren't razors in the tub!)
Put a band-aid where you want to cut
Run your wrists through cold water
Do schoolwork (if school isn't bothering you)
